description.value:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.K2TXdqQGwIEZcpSf]{Basic Touch} stance and have a hand free, and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.het2E8jTuLAbWvEK]{Synthestrike} is charged.

You make a deliberately slow attack, fooling foes into blocking or dodging at the wrong time. Make a Synthestrike and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against the target of your Strike. Do this immediately before making the Strike, but after choosing your target.

The [[/act feint traits=occult,illusion,visual]] gains the arcanima, illusion, and visual traits, and it always has the basic effects of a Feint, rather than applying any adjustments or alternate effects from other feats or abilities.
